roles.title: Chief Medical Information Officer
roles.company_description: A leading healthcare technology consulting firm specializing in digital transformation and clinical workflow optimization for large healthcare systems.
roles.job_description: Led strategic initiatives to modernize clinical information systems and improve patient care delivery through innovative technology solutions while maintaining operational excellence across multiple facilities.
accomplishments: Spearheaded the implementation of a $50M Epic EMR system across 5 hospitals, resulting in 30% improvement in clinical documentation efficiency
Developed and executed AI-driven clinical decision support system, reducing medication errors by 45% and improving patient outcomes
Established telemedicine programs across 12 specialties, increasing patient access by 200% during COVID-19 pandemic
Led cross-functional teams of 50+ IT and clinical staff, achieving 98% system uptime and 95% user satisfaction
